tool_description: The Chandler Bing Jokes API is a lighthearted and humorous tribute to the iconic actor Matthew Perry, celebrated for his role as Chandler Bing in the popular TV show "Friends." This API is designed to bring joy and laughter by offering a collection of witty and amusing jokes inspired by Chandler Bing's unique sense of humor.  The primary purpose of this API is to provide a playful platform where users can access a curated selection of jokes that capture the essence of Chandler Bing's sarcasti...
name: Chandler Bing Jokes API
title: Chandler Bing Jokes API

api_list.name: /jokes/:id
api_list.description: Retrieve a single joke based on the provided ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chandler-bing-jokes-api.p.rapidapi.com/jokes/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chandler-bing-jokes-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chandler-bing-jokes-api.p.rapidapi.com/jokes/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chandler-bing-jokes-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /jokes
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of first 25 jokes per page and for the rest of the jokes, you can page query
